movies.title: Harry Potter
movies.author: J. K. Rowling
movies.description: How he's described in the books… Harry had a thin face, knobbly knees, black hair and bright-green eyes. He wore round glasses held together with a lot of Sellotape because of all the times Dudley had punched him on the nose.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.author: J. R. R. Tolkien
movies.description: An epic journey to destroy the One Ring and save Middle-earth from the Dark Lord Sauron.

movies.title: Inception
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: A skilled thief is offered a chance to erase his criminal record by completing an almost impossible task: inception.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: Batman faces his toughest foe, the Joker, who wants to prove that anyone can become like him under the right circumstances.

movies.title: Avatar
movies.author: James Cameron
movies.description: A paraplegic Marine is sent to Pandora on a unique mission but becomes torn between following orders and protecting an alien civilization.

movies.title: Titanic
movies.author: James Cameron
movies.description: A young aristocrat falls in love with a kind but poor artist aboard the ill-fated R.M.S. Titanic.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.author: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movies.description: A computer hacker learns about the true nature of reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.author: Joss Whedon
movies.description: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.

movies.title: Joker
movies.author: Todd Phillips
movies.description: In Gotham City's fractured society, a mentally troubled comedian embarks on a downward spiral that leads to the creation of an iconic villain.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.author: John Lasseter
movies.description: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's room.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.author: Robert Zemeckis
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the events of Vietnam, Watergate, and other history unfold through the perspective of an Alabama man with an IQ of 75.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.author: Ridley Scott
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode IV - A New Hope
movies.author: George Lucas
movies.description: Luke Skywalker joins forces with a Jedi Knight, a cocky pilot, a Wookiee, and two droids to save the galaxy from the Empire's world-destroying battle station.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.author: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff
movies.description: Lion prince Simba and his father are targeted by his bitter uncle, who wants to ascend the throne himself.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.author: Frank Darabont
movies.description: Two imprisoned men form a deep bond over the years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.author: Francis Ford Coppola
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.author: Quentin Tarantino
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.author: Steven Spielberg
movies.description: In Nazi-occupied Poland during World War II, Oskar Schindler gradually becomes concerned for his Jewish employees after witnessing their persecution by the Nazis.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.author: David Fincher
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.author: Jonathan Demme
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must confide in an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to receive his help on catching another serial killer.

movies.title: Se7en
movies.author: David Fincher
movies.description: Two detectives hunt a serial killer who uses the seven deadly sins as his modus operandi.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.author: Frank Darabont
movies.description: A supernatural tale set on death row in a Southern prison, where gentle giant John Coffey has the miraculous ability to heal people's ailments.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: Eight years after the events of The Dark Knight, Bruce Wayne comes out of self-imposed exile when a new foe, Bane, emerges to threaten Gotham.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry, each trying to outperform the other's stage illusions, while dealing with their own personal demons.

movies.title: The Departed
movies.author: Martin Scorsese
movies.description: An undercover cop and a mole in the police attempt to identify each other while infiltrating an Irish gang in South Boston.

movies.title: The Usual Suspects
movies.author: Bryan Singer
movies.description: A sole survivor tells the twisted tale of the notorious Keyser Söze, who uses his fearsome reputation to manipulate others.

movies.title: Goodfellas
movies.author: Martin Scorsese
movies.description: The story of Henry Hill and his life in the mob, covering his rise to power and eventual downfall.

movies.title: The Shining
movies.author: Stanley Kubrick
movies.description: A family heads to an isolated hotel for the winter where an evil spiritual presence drives the father to violence, while his psychic son sees horrific forebodings from the past and future.

movies.title: Inception
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: A thief who enters the dreams of others to steal secrets from their subconscious is given a chance to have his criminal history erased if he can successfully perform an inception.

movies.title: The Lion King
movies.author: Roger Allers, Rob Minkoff
movies.description: A lion prince is cast out of his pride by his cruel uncle, who claims he killed his father. While living in exile with two companions, he grows up, and learns to take his rightful place as king.

movies.title: Star Wars: Episode V - The Empire Strikes Back
movies.author: Irvin Kershner
movies.description: After the rebels are brutally overpowered by the Empire on Hoth, Luke Skywalker begins Jedi training with Yoda, while his friends are pursued by Darth Vader.

movies.title: The Matrix
movies.author: Lana Wachowski, Lilly Wachowski
movies.description: A computer hacker learns from mysterious rebels about the true nature of his reality and his role in the war against its controllers.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Forrest Gump
movies.author: Robert Zemeckis
movies.description: The presidencies of Kennedy and Johnson, the Vietnam War, the Watergate scandal and other historical events unfold from the perspective of an Alabama man with an extraordinary, though simple mind.

movies.title: The Dark Knight
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: When the menace known as the Joker emerges from his mysterious past, he wreaks havoc and chaos on the people of Gotham, forcing Batman to consider new methods of fighting crime.

movies.title: The Godfather: Part II
movies.author: Francis Ford Coppola
movies.description: The early life and career of Vito Corleone in 1920s New York is portrayed, along with the rise to power of his son Michael as the new Godfather.

movies.title: Back to the Future
movies.author: Robert Zemeckis
movies.description: Marty McFly, a teenager, is accidentally sent 30 years into the past in a time-traveling DeLorean invented by his close friend, the eccentric scientist Doc Brown.

movies.title: The Green Mile
movies.author: Frank Darabont
movies.description: A supernatural tale set on death row in a Southern prison, where gentle giant John Coffey has the miraculous ability to heal people's ailments.

movies.title: The Lord of the Rings: The Fellowship of the Ring
movies.author: Peter Jackson
movies.description: A young hobbit, Frodo Baggins, is tasked with destroying a powerful artifact, the One Ring, to prevent the dark lord Sauron from ruling Middle-earth.

movies.title: Pulp Fiction
movies.author: Quentin Tarantino
movies.description: The lives of two mob hitmen, a boxer, a gangster's wife, and a pair of diner bandits intertwine in four tales of violence and redemption.

movies.title: Schindler's List
movies.author: Steven Spielberg
movies.description: In German-occupied Poland during World War II, businessman Oskar Schindler saves more than a thousand Polish Jews from the Holocaust by employing them in his factory.

movies.title: Fight Club
movies.author: David Fincher
movies.description: An insomniac office worker and a devil-may-care soap maker form an underground fight club that evolves into something much, much more.

movies.title: The Shawshank Redemption
movies.author: Frank Darabont
movies.description: Two imprisoned men bond over a number of years, finding solace and eventual redemption through acts of common decency.

movies.title: The Godfather
movies.author: Francis Ford Coppola
movies.description: The aging patriarch of an organized crime dynasty transfers control of his clandestine empire to his reluctant son.

movies.title: The Prestige
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: Two magicians engage in a bitter rivalry, each trying to create the ultimate stage illusion while sacrificing everything they have to outwit each other.

movies.title: Gladiator
movies.author: Ridley Scott
movies.description: A former Roman General sets out to exact vengeance against the corrupt emperor who murdered his family and sent him into slavery.

movies.title: The Silence of the Lambs
movies.author: Jonathan Demme
movies.description: A young FBI cadet must receive the help of an incarcerated and manipulative cannibal killer to help catch another serial killer, a madman who skins his victims.

movies.title: The Dark Knight Rises
movies.author: Christopher Nolan
movies.description: Eight years after the Joker's reign of terror, Batman is forced to come out of retirement when a new foe, Bane, threatens Gotham City.

movies.title: Toy Story 3
movies.author: Lee Unkrich
movies.description: As Andy prepares to leave for college, Woody, Buzz, and the rest of the toys are mistakenly delivered to a daycare center instead, where they face new challenges.

series.title: ga me of thrones
first episode
series.description: As Andy prepares to leave for college, Woody, Buzz, and the rest of the toys are mistakenly delivered to a daycare center instead, where they face new challenges.

series.title: second episode
series.description: The conflict between the Starks and the Lannisters escalates as secrets begin to unravel.

series.title: third episode
series.description: Daenerys faces new challenges in her quest for power across the Narrow Sea.

series.title: fourth episode
series.description: Jon Snow discovers secrets beyond the Wall that could change everything.

series.title: fifth episode
series.description: Tyrion navigates the political intrigue of King’s Landing while Arya struggles to survive.
Nine noble families fight for control over the lands of Westeros, while an ancient enemy returns after being dormant for millennia.

series.title: breaking bad
pilot
series.description: High school chemistry teacher Walter White’s life changes when he is diagnosed with terminal lung cancer.

series.title: cat’s in the bag...
series.description: Walt and Jesse struggle to dispose of the bodies and face consequences of their actions.

series.title: the bag’s in the river
series.description: Walter faces a moral crisis as he decides the fate of a captive.

series.title: cancer man
series.description: Walter reveals his diagnosis to his family, while Hank investigates a new drug operation.

series.title: gray matter
series.description: Walter’s past with former colleagues resurfaces, offering him a way out of his financial troubles.
A high school chemistry teacher turned methamphetamine producer partners with a former student to secure his family’s future before he dies.

series.title: stranger things
the vanishing of will byers
series.description: When a young boy disappears, his mother, a police chief, and his friends must confront terrifying forces to get him back.

series.title: the weirdo on maple street
series.description: Mike hides Eleven in his house and begins to learn more about her extraordinary abilities.

series.title: holly, jolly
series.description: Joyce tries to connect with her son through Christmas lights, while Nancy and Jonathan team up to investigate Steve’s house.

series.title: the body
series.description: After Will’s body is discovered in the lake, his friends begin to question what they believe.

series.title: the flea and the acrobat
series.description: Hopper breaks into Hawkins Laboratory to uncover the truth about the mysterious events.
A group of kids discover a series of supernatural mysteries in their small town, unraveling government secrets and battling strange forces.

series.title: the witcher
the end's beginning
series.description: Geralt of Rivia battles a monstrous creature while facing prejudice from humans in a divided land.

series.title: four marks
series.description: Yennefer’s tragic past unfolds while Geralt encounters a cursed nobleman in his latest contract.

series.title: betrayer moon
series.description: Geralt investigates a beast terrorizing a kingdom, while Yennefer endures brutal magical training.

series.title: of banquets, bastards, and burials
series.description: Geralt attends a royal feast, facing danger as secrets and betrayal surface.

series.title: bottled appetites
series.description: A djinn's powers force Geralt and Yennefer into an uneasy alliance with dangerous consequences.
A mutated monster-hunter for hire, Geralt of Rivia, struggles to find his place in a world where people often prove more wicked than beasts.

series.title: the mandalorian
chapter 1: the mandalorian
series.description: A lone bounty hunter accepts a mysterious assignment from a high-paying client.

series.title: chapter 2: the child
series.description: The Mandalorian must secure valuable cargo while dealing with relentless enemies.

series.title: chapter 3: the sin
series.description: Faced with a moral dilemma, the Mandalorian makes a risky decision that changes everything.

series.title: chapter 4: sanctuary
series.description: Seeking refuge, the Mandalorian finds himself defending a village from raiders.

series.title: chapter 5: the gunslinger
series.description: The Mandalorian teams up with a rookie bounty hunter for a dangerous mission.
A lone Mandalorian bounty hunter navigates the outer reaches of the galaxy, facing dangerous foes and unexpected allies.

series.title: the boys
the name of the game
series.description: Hughie suffers a devastating loss at the hands of super-powered individuals and is recruited by Billy Butcher to take them down.

series.title: cherry
series.description: Billy, Hughie, and the team set their sights on uncovering the dark secrets behind the world's most popular superheroes.

series.title: get some
series.description: As Hughie and Starlight grow closer, the team finds a lead that could expose the superheroes' corruption.

series.title: the female of the species
series.description: The Boys encounter a mysterious woman who could shift the balance in their fight against the supers.

series.title: good for the soul
series.description: While tensions rise within The Seven, The Boys make a bold move that could expose the superheroes’ darkest secrets.
In a world where superheroes abuse their powers, a group of vigilantes sets out to take them down and expose their corruption.
